```{r cars}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(psycho)
library(ggpubr)


d1<- read_csv("~/Desktop/cc/riv.csv")
d1<- gather(d1, "roi","distance",-sub,-cond)


d2<- read_csv("~/Desktop/cc/rep.csv")
d2<- gather(d2, "roi","distance",-sub,-cond)

d<-bind_rows(d1,d2)



```

```{r}

Result <- aov(distance ~ (factor(cond)*factor(roi)) + Error(factor(sub)/factor(cond)*factor(roi)), data=d)

riv_d<- d %>% filter(cond == "riv")
res.aov <- aov(distance ~ factor(roi), data = riv_d)
summary(res.aov)

```
